unnormalised: Hey, I love athlete biographies! Just finished reading about Mithali Raj; inspiring stuff! Remember "Chak De! India"? Similar feeling. Next, I am planning to read one about Milkha Singh. Anyone has suggestions? Maybe someone who studied at IIT, Delhi? So many good ones! Hoping for 100Rs. off!
